data.name: AppTitle
data.comment: Title of the main dialog

data.name: BouncynessValueOutOfRange
data.value: Der Hüpfwert (aktuell {0}) muss zwischen 0 und 0.5 sein
data.comment: Message to shown when the bouncyness value of the grid with animation exceeds the range, must be within [0;0.5]

data.name: BucketColumnDisplay
data.comment: The value displayed in the minimized version of the buckets column

data.name: UserSettingsNotOpened
data.value: Settings couldn't not be read or created. Make sure that the harddrive of the computer is not full.
data.comment: Message to display when something fails during deserialization of UserSettings.

data.name: UserSettingsNotSaved
data.value: Settings couldn't not be saved. Make sure that the harddrive of the computer is not full. Do you still want to exit?
data.comment: Message to display when something fails during serialization of UserSettings.

data.name: SettingsNotSavedMsgBoxTitle
data.comment: Caption of the messagebox which is displayed when saving failed on closing.

data.name: CDDBEntryChooserTitle
data.comment: Title of the CDDB Chooser Dialog

data.name: CDDriveLabel
data.comment: Label text for label left of the cd drives combobox

data.name: continueImportText
data.comment: Text appearing on the start import button after a import has started

data.name: FileMenuClose
data.comment: Title of the "Close" entry in the file menu

data.name: FileMenuAddBucket
data.comment: Title of the "Add Bucket" entry in the file menu

data.name: FileMenuOpenBucket
data.comment: Title of the "Open Bucket" entry in the file menu

data.name: FileMenuTitle
data.comment: Title of the file menu

data.name: FrequencyOutOfRange
data.value: The frequency of the animation bounce must be within 1 and 2134
data.comment: Message to show when the bounce animation frequency is out of range.

data.name: HelpMenuTitle
data.comment: Title of the "Help" menu

data.name: ImportColumnDisplay
data.comment: The value displayed in the minimized version of the import column

data.name: ImportLVColumnArtist
data.comment: Import Listview Title of "Artist" Column

data.name: ImportLVColumnGenre
data.comment: Import Listview Title of the "Genre" Colums

data.name: ImportLVColumnTrackNr
data.comment: Import Listview Title of "Track number" Column

data.name: ImportLVColumnTrackTitle
data.comment: Import Listview Title of "Track Title" column

data.name: ImportLVColumnYear
data.comment: Import Listview Title of the "Year" column

data.name: NoCDDBEntriesFound
data.value: No Entry on CDDB database found
data.comment: Message saying that the inserted cd doesn't contain a cddb entry ( yet)

data.name: NoCDDriveSelected
data.comment: Message to display when a cd drive is selected

data.name: NoCDInserted
data.value: No CD has been inserted or cd is not readable
data.comment: Message to display when the CD TOC couldn't be read

data.name: PlayerColumnDisplay
data.comment: The minimized value of the player column.

data.name: SharpnessValueOutOfRange
data.value: The sharpness value (currently {0}) must be within 0 and 1 (1 excluded)
data.comment: Message to shown when sharpness values of the grid with animation exceeds the range, must be within [0;1[

data.name: startImportText
data.comment: Text appearing on the start import button

data.name: noBucketSelectedText
data.value: Music should always be placed in buckets, please select at least one
data.comment: Text being displayed if not tries to make and import without having buckets selecte

data.name: addBucketButtonText
data.comment: Text on the add bucket button

data.name: Cancel
data.comment: this is rather self-explanatory, isn't it?

data.name: copyToBucketError
data.value: something bad happened during copying of mp3 to bucket located at {}, is the bucket writeable?
data.comment: Text to display when copying the file to the bucket fails during import, argument is the bucket location

data.name: importTerminated
data.comment: import terminated message

data.name: NewBucketDialogButtonOK
data.comment: ok button text, this should be a little alternative, not something like "yes", or "ok"

data.name: NewBucketDialogIncludeSubfolders
data.comment: Checkbox text on NewBucketDialog

data.name: NewBucketDialogSelectFolder
data.comment: The select folder button text on NewBucketDialog

data.name: NewBucketDialogTitle
data.comment: The title of the new bucket dialog

data.name: NewBucketDialogTitleTitle
data.comment: TextBlock text above the title textbox

data.name: removeBucketButtonText
data.comment: Text on the remove bucket button

data.name: BucketDescriptionExcludingSubfolders
data.comment: appears after the path in de bucket description display

data.name: BucketDescriptionIncludingSubfolders
data.comment: appears after the path in de bucket description display

data.name: BucketDescriptionPathPrefix
data.comment: appears before the path in the bucket description display

data.name: BucketDescriptionTitlePrefix
data.comment: appears before the bucket title in the bucket description display

data.name: ReallyRemoveBucket
data.value: Do you really want to remove the selected bucket?
data.comment: Question dialog content for removing Buckets

data.name: ReallyRemoveBucketTitle
data.comment: Question dialog title for removin buckets

data.name: importProcessRunning
data.value: An import is already on the way, wait for it to finish before starting a new one

data.name: ProgressConversion
data.comment: Progress display message for conversion

data.name: ProgressImport
data.comment: Progress display message for import

data.name: frameContent
data.comment: frame content description text of frame list entry

data.name: iscompressed
data.comment: frame list flag description, see TagFrame class description

data.name: isencrypted
data.comment: frame list flag description, see TagFrame class description

data.name: isGrouped
data.comment: frame list flag description, see TagFrame class description

data.name: preserveWhenFileAlters
data.comment: frame list flag description, see TagFrame class description

data.name: preserveWhenTagAlters
data.comment: frame list flag description, see TagFrame class description

data.name: readOnly
data.comment: frame list flag description, see TagFrame class description

data.name: showFrameList
data.comment: show frame list button text

data.name: frameListDialogTitle
data.comment: Frame List Dialog Title for ID3v23 tag

data.name: FileName
data.comment: The text "File Name" (name of file)

data.name: ImportLVColumnAlbum
data.comment: Import Listview Title of the "Album" column

data.name: AboutDialogText
data.comment: About text, please add some ethic or political content. First argument is the versison, second is the build date.

data.name: HelpAbout
data.comment: About menu item

data.name: SettingsMenuImportSettings
data.comment: Settings Menu, item "import", opens dialog for settings import options

data.name: SettingsMenuText
data.comment: Menu entry text for settings

data.name: SettingsMenuVisuals
data.comment: Settings Menu, item "visuals", open dialog for settings visuals parameters

data.name: OK
data.comment: this is also rather self-explanatory

data.name: VisualsSettingsDialogTitle
data.comment: Visual settings dialog title

data.name: VisualsSettingsLabels
data.comment: the labels for the visuals settings dialog

data.name: VisualsSettingsNumbersNotParsed
data.value: Number could not be read, make sure to use the correct comma separator (',' in german)
data.comment: message to display of the number could not be parsed in the visuals settings dialog

data.name: FolderBrowserDialogTitle
data.comment: Dialog Title for the Select Folder Dialog

data.name: frameListDialogTitleV22
data.comment: Frame List Dialog Title for IDv22 tag

data.name: BucketLVTagTypes
data.comment: Colum for tags types of the middle listview

data.name: importRunning
data.value: A CD is currently imported, MusicBucket cannot be closed
data.comment: Message to display when the user wants to close musicbucket while an import is running

data.name: ImportSettingsDialogTitle
data.comment: Title of the import settings dialog

data.name: ImportSettingsDialogInvalidBitrate
data.comment: Exception text for the exception thrown when on tries to set an invalid bitrate int the import settings.

data.name: SettingsMenuLanguage
data.comment: The menu item for selecting the language
